title: The White House, Washington, D.C.
marks:
Signature; Title; Edition

in pencil, bottom edg in pencil, LRC on back: [Toby Old 1990]
description: White House across street at R; man on stilts, with long striped pants covering then, wearing a false white beard and carrying a horn; 2 men in front, seen from back, one seated and one standing
creditline: Gift of the Artist, by exchange
